Articles.Content:
Welcome RayvenQ to the Moderation team. Rayven\'s been with the us since July 2011. His application to become a moderator was part of the 2nd wave of moderators started by HarvesteR several months ago. He was given then green light then, but to our fault was accidentally overlooked. This transparency should so the mod team is willing to admit it\'s mistakes. As such we\'ve spoken with Rayven and brought him on board. He\'ll be joining the Europe team moderation group under Sordid.

Also welcome Tiberion to the mod team! You all should know one of thee most actives members in our community. He\'s been a very active member in the Testing team, has been very helpfully and generally was seen to be a wanted addition by the whole of the mod team. He\'ll be joining the Americas mod team group under myself.

Give them a good welcome guys!

-DR

PS: As a note, this now puts the mod team at 15 total active moderators, from the CM, to the Globals, down to the regular mods. Remember that the list of mods is located here: http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=6931.0
Congratulations to the new mods!
Congradulations! I hope one day I can join you!

Congrats to the new mods.

How come its always new mods and not new Community managers or stuff like that?
Because we only need one CM.

Congratulations!

Hopefully I can join too someday...
Congrats.
Many congratulations!
Welcome aboard. Remember that the top rack of the fridge is Skunky\'s and it\'s wired with claymores.

Woo!

(I\'m adding this so it is no longer a one word post expressing my joy.)
what happend to radion?
Congrats!

congrats guys!

Congratulations you two!

what happend to radion?

As I said, I am a sectional moderator. Unlisted, at that. But oh well, moving along.

As I said, I am a sectional moderator. Unlisted, at that. But oh well, moving along.

Actually, you are listed. Right under KSP Roleplaying. Sectional Moderators don\'t get a 'title' change since they\'re not a moderator everywhere. Most forum software requires you to setup a special title class if you want to do that, it\'s not an automatic group.

I know that. I\'m not listed in the moderator list page. But anyway, lets stop derailing this thread.

Congratulations, Tiberion! TiberDyne is just getting better! The Shuttle is great, and NovaPunch is out of this world!
Congrats guys. just make sure you keep the awesome parts coming.

Thanks everyone. Locking this now to let it settle down the list (lots of new people since then )
